text: The Children of Llullaillaco were 3 mummies of children who were found in Argentina. It appears that they had been sacrificed to the Incan gods. == Discovery == These mummies were discovered at the top of a mountain in the Andes. They were found to be "the world's best preserved mummies" == Related Article == * Mummy Juanita == References == Category:1999 Category:Archaeology Category:History of Argentina Category:History of Chile
title: Children of Llullaillaco
